page.title: 11ARNCLIFFE HALL
page.content: Lady Bell has lived at Arncliffe Hall G.R.455002 since 1958.The Bell family owns 3000 acres of land in the area including 4 farms which are part of the estate.She and her sons run the estate and organize their farm managers and farm workers.Beef cattle,sheep,pigs and goats are kept as well as arable crops being grown. Arncliffe Hall itself was built in 1754 and was owned by the Mauleverer family.It was passed onto the Brown family and the Bell family bought the Hall and estate at the beginning of the century.The Hall is renowned for its beautiful ceilings, one of which depicts nearby Roseberry Topping.The house has three floors plus a cellar.Outside there is a decorative moat which has recently been restored and cleared.
